snippet.title: FEE3 2023: On the Edge by Alguien
snippet.description:
On the Edge is a short 5 chapter hack about over the top edgy swordmaster action, while parodying it on the way. The gameplay is puzzle-like, with stats being almost entirely 0s for everyone, and a focus on weapon matchups, while maps remain mostly open ended. You also get only one unit. It's barely Fire Emblem at this point. You could say it's... on the edge. 😎

https://feuniverse.us/t/fe8-on-the-edge-5-chapters-complete-gone-wrong-not-clickbait
